name: Momentum (itch) (HannaFriden)
description:
Turn moving platforms and jump pads on and off using your tool, be careful however, the power of your tool is limited and you can only control a limited amount of objects at a time. Watch out for platforms and jump pads which may return to their original state as you control new objects!

Genre: Puzzle Platformer
Platform: Windows
Singleplayer

---------------

Premise:

Momentum is a light puzzle platformer, set in a place where the technology is run on the forces of time. In order to sustain it, time has been harvested from several timelines. Due to this harvest, the time continuum has started to fall apart.

It is up to you to find the time vault and release time back into the world. You will face challenges as you traverse this which will test your ability in timing and planning.

To your aid, you have a tool which can directly control the time energy the technology is run on. But the tool’s power is not unlimited and it cannot maintain the control of all objects at once. Due to its restrictions, you need to carefully time and plan in order to progress.

---------------

Momentum is a student project at the school FutureGames. It was made during 7 weeks. We hope you will enjoy our game!

Design: Hanna Fridén – Charlotte Barnekow – Marco Turzynski
Programming:  Olivia Follin – Vilde Brobacke – Alexander Lövberg
3D:  Tony Högye – Johan Lind – Oskar Ivarsson
2D:  Emanuel Axelsson – Jonatan Sleiers – Josefin Strand
